summary: "The Metamorphosis" is a short novel by Franz Kafka. It tells the story of Gregor Samsa, a salesman who wakes up one day to find he has turned into a giant insect. Gregor struggles to accept his new form and adapt to his life. This story is famous for its strange and thought-provoking ideas. It was first published in 1915 in a magazine and later as a book. Many people have interpreted its meaning differently.
title: The Metamorphosis
